short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The analytics extension for TikTok influencers, sellers, agencies, and brands.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ğŸ“£ Overview 
EchoTik Analytics is the ultimate extension designed for TikTok influencers, sellers, agencies, and brands. 
As the leading TikTok e-commerce influencer and product analysis assistant, it helps sellers and talents make better marketing decisions and content. TikTok Analytics by EchoTik is a powerful TikTok e-commerce data extension introduced by EchoTik.live platform, catering to global sellers, TSPs, brands, and creators. 
EchoTik is the TikTok marketing analytics platform providing unparalleled TikTok metrics tracker capabilities and TikTok audience insights. Optimize your TikTok content performance monitor and leverage our TikTok growth hacking tools for ultimate success. 
Plus, enjoy free audience visualization features to enhance your TikTok experience.

ğŸš€ Latest upgrade: 
â— Real-time display of TikTok account location. 
â— View some basic account information without login.

ğŸ’¡ Key features of the extension: 
â— Add a shortcut button on TikTok.com and TikTok Shop Affiliate to easily obtain influencer and product data using our TikTok analytics tool. 
â— Most powerful TikTok influencer marketing tools: view key metrics such as engagement rate, and likes-to-followers ratio, and analyze 90-day trends; retrieve popular video tags used by influencers. 
â— Exclusive product discovery: find product videos in an influencer's profile. 
â— Exclusive product analysis: view product sales, 30-day trends, and promotional data on TikTok's product page. 
â— Bilingual support in English and Chinese. 
â— Real-time display of TikTok account location with our TikTok data analysis software. 
â— Practical features such as influencer and product Favorite, one-click video sorting, one-click monitoring of influencer live stream data, and more. 
â— Clear TikTok data visualization for the audience. 
â— For more insights, check our TikTok reporting dashboard.

ğŸ” For more information: 
â— EchoTik official website: https://echotik.live 
â— Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/tikecho 
â— Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/e
